sense.name: conceal for secrecy or protection
sense.examples: The young woman hid her face in her hands. I ran and hid from my brother Mark. He tries to hide his bald patch by sweeping his hair over to one side. I like wearing sunglasses. I feel I can hide behind them. Probably his horse would be close to where he was hiding. She is hiding out in a cabin in Montana. Don't trust a supplier that tries to hide the facts! She tried to hide her disappointment at not getting the promotion. This ancient historic temple is hidden in mystery. I feel sure there's something about her past that she's trying to hide from me.
